reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 515/98: DELEGATION OF AUTHORITY - WELLINGTON COUNTY
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 515/98: DELEGATION OF AUTHORITY - WELLINGTON COUNTY
reg_info.act_under: Planning Act   Loi sur l’aménagement du territoire

content.content: 1. (1) The Minister’s authority to approve official plans and amendments to official plans under the Act is delegated to the council of the County of Wellington with respect to official plans and amendments to official plans for the local municipalities of the County of Wellington commenced on or after September 30, 1998. O. Reg. 515/98, s. 1 (1). (2) The Minister’s authority to approve official plans and amendments to official plans under the Act is delegated to the council of the County of Wellington with respect to official plans and amendments to official plans for the local municipalities of the County of Wellington whose file numbers are set out in the Schedule. O. Reg. 515/98, s. 1 (2).
content.raw_html:
1. (1) The Minister’s authority to approve official plans and amendments to official plans under the Act is delegated to the council of the County of Wellington with respect to official plans and amendments to official plans for the local municipalities of the County of Wellington commenced on or after September 30, 1998. O. Reg. 515/98, s. 1 (1).

(2) The Minister’s authority to approve official plans and amendments to official plans under the Act is delegated to the council of the County of Wellington with respect to official plans and amendments to official plans for the local municipalities of the County of Wellington whose file numbers are set out in the Schedule. O. Reg. 515/98, s. 1 (2).

content.content: 2. All authority of the Minister in respect of applications for amendments to the official plans for the local municipalities of the County of Wellington that were made to the local municipalities before September 30, 1998 but were not adopted by the councils of the local municipalities before September 30, 1998 is delegated to the council of the County of Wellington. O. Reg. 515/98, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. All authority of the Minister in respect of applications for amendments to the official plans for the local municipalities of the County of Wellington that were made to the local municipalities before September 30, 1998 but were not adopted by the councils of the local municipalities before September 30, 1998 is delegated to the council of the County of Wellington. O. Reg. 515/98, s. 2.

content.content: 3. (1) If any of the authority delegated to the council in this Regulation is in turn delegated by the council to a committee of council or an appointed officer under subsection 5 (1) of the Act, the council shall forward to the Minister a certified copy of the delegating by-law within 15 days of its passing. O. Reg. 515/98, s. 3 (1). (2) The delegations of authority set out in this Regulation are not terminated by reason only that subsection (1) is not complied with. O. Reg. 515/98, s. 3 (2).
content.raw_html:
3. (1) If any of the authority delegated to the council in this Regulation is in turn delegated by the council to a committee of council or an appointed officer under subsection 5 (1) of the Act, the council shall forward to the Minister a certified copy of the delegating by-law within 15 days of its passing. O. Reg. 515/98, s. 3 (1).

(2) The delegations of authority set out in this Regulation are not terminated by reason only that subsection (1) is not complied with. O. Reg. 515/98, s. 3 (2).

4. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 515/98, s. 4.
